abstract: American missionary Rev Phyllis Sortor is kidnapped from school in central Nigeria in area prone to kidnappings for ransom; officials say it is probably not work of Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: A ransom has been demanded, according to officials, who said the kidnapping was probably not the work of the Islamist militant group Boko Haram.
snippet: A ransom has been demanded, according to officials, who said the kidnapping was probably not the work of the Islamist militant group Boko Haram.
